description: Defines an AuthService class responsible for user authentication, including login, registration, and sign-out methods. It uses Flutter's ChangeNotifier to notify UI components of state changes and currently contains a mock implementation with simulated delays.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class managing user authentication state, including login, registration, and sign-out, with a mock delay simulation.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Simulates user login with email and password, sets authentication state if credentials are valid.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Simulates user registration, setting authentication state upon completion.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Logs out the user by resetting authentication state.
